location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to John Kaye, Accountant General at Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter refers to enclosed account disbursements for the residency for February 1815 and a report of cash in the treasury for March 1815. The latter only is enclosed and states the amount of cash in the Bushire Treasury on 1 March 1815 and is signed by James Orton, Assistant Surgeon.
